name: Abyss Knight
description:
In this game, you play as a magical knight to was teleported to an unknown dungeon the only way out is to defeat the Boss Monster of the dungeon to escape. You will have spells, swords, and potions from enemies.

Created for the 7-Day Game Jam 2023

Started 03/04/2023

Finished 03/10/2023

Credits

Matthew Haiaght - Team Lead, Gameplay Designer (AI), Level designer,   Technical Designer

Kamron Garner - UI and Menus

Peter Bankston - Procedural Generation

Luis Flores Loveras - Technical Designer

Eduardo Emilio Perez Vera - Level desinger
